CustomField.formula:
IF (TEXT(Risk_Level__c) = "High",
IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Red Flag"),
IF (TEXT(Risk_Level__c) = "Medium",
IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif","Yellow Flag"),
IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif","Green Flag")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Risk Level Flag - Red = High, Yellow = Medium, Green = Low
CustomField.label: Risk Flag
